name: SetVariable
description: Sets or changes the value of a variable. Either a new or an existing one. Optionally a transform can be applied.
author: Yod Labs

inputs.name: variableName
inputs.label: Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable you wish to set the value. Either a new or an existing one.

inputs.name: value
inputs.label: Variable new value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The new value of the variable, you can use other variables values.

inputs.name: transform
inputs.label: Transformation
inputs.helpMarkDown: The transformation to be applied to the value. You can do nothing, uppercase it, lowercase it or replace parts of the string

inputs.name: searchValue
inputs.label: search value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The value or regular expression that will be replaced by the new value (all ocurrences).

inputs.name: newValue
inputs.label: replace with
inputs.helpMarkDown: The value to replace the search value with.

inputs.name: indexStart
inputs.label: Index start (0 based)
inputs.helpMarkDown: An integer between 0 and the length of the string, specifying the offset into the string of the first character to include in the returned substring.

inputs.name: indexEnd
inputs.label: Index end (0 based)
inputs.helpMarkDown: An integer between 0 and the length of the string, which specifies the offset into the string of the first character not to include in the returned substring.

inputs.name: regexpMatchNumber
inputs.label: Match group number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The match number to set, zero for the entire match. 1 for the first group match, etc

inputs.name: regexpCaseInsensitive
inputs.label: Case Insensitive
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the match be case insensitive or not.

inputs.name: regexpFailNoMatch
inputs.label: Fail if no match
inputs.helpMarkDown: If there is no match fail build.

inputs.name: regexpReplaceValue
inputs.label: Replacement Value/Expression
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replace with. Supports replacement patterns $<number> for grouping,, $& for matched substring,etc.  etc. It uses Javascript Regular Expression replacement rules

inputs.name: regexpReplaceCaseInsensitive
inputs.label: Case Insensitive
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the match be case insensitive or not.

inputs.name: regexpReplaceReplaceAll
inputs.label: Replace all
inputs.helpMarkDown: replace all ocurrences or only one.
